Barebones Platformer Demo

This is a platformer proof-of-concept for Perigee. As you'll see, it's not yet the most visually appealing. Feel free to add your own style for your project! Your objective: get to the green zone.

Move

  • WASD (Keyboard)
  • Left Stick (Controller)
  • On-Screen Stick (Touch Screen)

Jump

  • Spacebar (Keyboard)
  • Button Pad South (Controller)
  • On-Screen Jump Button (Touch Screen)
